resources.string: No configuration file detected. Please ensure the i18nStrings plugin has been integrated into your project and the \"i18nStrings\" task has been executed in the app module.

Our app now supports multiple language options, including some that are still experimental. these experimental language support may contain errors, inaccurate translations, or incomplete display of text. we are working hard to improve support for these languages, but cannot guarantee that they will be bug-free or of the same quality standard as other fully supported languages. \nusers using experimental language options should understand that our team will not be held responsible for any problems caused by using these experimental language options, including but not limited to misunderstood information, misleading or any other potential problems. \nwe encourage users to report any issues or bugs they find when using these experimental language options. we appreciate your understanding and support, and our team is committed to continuously improving and perfecting multilingual support.
Restart to take effect after switching languages
Are you sure to switch and restart?
Are you sure to refresh translate data?
Estimated %d minutes to translate %d texts. Proceed?
Estimated %d seconds to translate %d texts. Proceed?
The translation is estimated to take %ds, please be patient.
Please check the error log and make sure your network can visit https://translate.google.com
